response.overview: 1987 was an eventful year for three teens. Megan, Stephanie, & Jennifer. Jennifer was only 14 yeas old when she got mysteriously murdered by someone, but no one knows who. The two girls are devastated that Jennifer is dead. They missed all of there memories. Especially with there favorite camera. This thrilling horror shows the two girls slowly putting the pieces  together to find out who murdered Jennifer Hadrel, on February 2nd, 1987.
response.tagline: "Silenced over time, her last breath becomes the ultimate scream... or scene."
response.title: Talk To The Hand
